title: LF Gold/Plat Players for Ranked 5s, Any Role
body: LF people to play some ranked 5s with, we have 2 plats and a gold atm. any lane will do. Add me in game Xclusiv

replies.body:
I'm a returning member to league, been doing solo queue which has lowered my ranked greatly, maybe you can watch and see how I play because if think I'm a great player a don't wanna get feeders or any lower rank than I have gotten 
Hope you give me a chance 
~GuiGreenPotatoes
And this is my 2nd account I forgot my gold 3 account :c

Ign: Sam cole
Jungler main
Support second pref
Ganking strengths are mid and bot
Skype is available.

-IGN: Darkfire81
-Skype name (if you have): I can get it
How long have you been playing: 3 years
-Ranked Experience: been playing for one year gold v last season. Haven't ranked this season yet though. Been on several teams but nothing too serious.
-Role: support
-Champions played: almost all. Main thresh, nami, Leona, and morg.
-Name: manny
-Age: 26
-What part of the game do you think most important to your role: warding and creating opportunities for the team through smart pick offs. Can also manage baron and dragon timers.
-comment: I have a weird work schedule though if on team. So a practice schedule would have to be created for the month due to my work schedule being changed every month.
